1.content: Complete Frontend Database Cross-Reference Audit Report
1.details: Create comprehensive audit report documenting the cross-reference analysis between database tables and frontend implementations. Report should include evidence for each table's usage status and recommendations for cleanup vs. development.

2.content: Complete Client Intake System with All Dependencies
2.details: Build out the complete client intake workflow including: 1) Vendor management system integration 2) Insurance company database and integrations 3) Client profile management 4) Adjuster relationship management 5) Attorney network integration 6) Complete intake wizard with all data validation and processing

3.content: Develop Lead Generation and Sales Funnel System
3.details: Create comprehensive lead capture and management system: 1) Embeddable form builder for websites/social media 2) Lead scoring and qualification system 3) Automated follow-up sequences 4) CRM integration for lead-to-client conversion 5) Analytics and conversion tracking 6) Multi-channel lead capture (social media, referrals, web)

4.details: Build advanced communication infrastructure: 1) Phone call recording and transcription system 2) Text message integration with client files 3) Email automation and client file association 4) Communication history and audit trails 5) Multi-channel communication dashboard 6) Automated reminder and follow-up systems

5.content: Develop AI Assistant for All System Phases
5.details: Create comprehensive AI assistant system: 1) Claims guidance and processing assistance 2) Document analysis and extraction 3) Settlement prediction and recommendations 4) Legal guidance and compliance checking 5) Client communication assistance 6) Workflow optimization suggestions 7) Predictive analytics for case outcomes

6.details: Develop comprehensive implementation plan with: 1) Technical architecture documentation 2) Development timeline and milestones 3) Resource requirements and dependencies 4) Integration specifications 5) Testing and deployment strategies 6) Training materials and user guides
